definition[0]: a step just outside a door to a house or building
example[0]: He stood on the doorstep, straightening his tie.
definition[1]: a very thick piece of bread
definition[2]: if politicians or journalists doorstep people, they visit people at their homes in order to get votes or information â€“ often used to show disapproval
example[2]: Journalists had doorstepped the couple and their neighbours.
